summary: You can now wear the Greybeard\'s robes
descriptionHtml:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~WEARABLE GREYBEARD ROBE~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~BY: ALFATOSSA~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


INSTALLATION:

-Put the \"Wearable_Greybeard Robe.esp\" file in your \"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\data\" folder
-Activate it in the data file tab on the Skyrim launcher
-Enjoy!


DESCRIPTION:

It allows you to wear the Greybeard robes complete set.
author: Alfatossa
